title: Candidate Forums: Attorney General
teaser: Our series of candidate forums for the fall general elections continues with a look at the race for Wisconsin attorney general. Joy Cardin talks with WPR reporter Gilman Halsted about the latest happenings in the contest. Then, Republican candidate Brad Schimel and Democrat Susan Happ weigh in on the major issues of the campaign and make their best cases as to why they deserve your vote.
